DOC.detailed_description: A prospective randomize clinical trial perform . Patients randomize 2 group . The experimental group undergo combine application intraperitoneal irrigation clindamycin ( 600mg ) gentamicin ( 240 mg ) solution 250 ml normal saline , fascial closure Triclosan-impregnated polyglactin suture application mupirocin ointment skin staple , addition standard care measure . The control group undergo standard care measure , include decontamination skin surgery chlorhexidine alcohol solution , administration systemic antibiotic prophylaxis application thermal blanket avoid hypothermia . In control group , fascial closure perform polyglactin suture ( without Triclosan impregnation ) . Incisional surgical-site infection investigate .
